name: javascript-project
description: ### Abstract: The primary purpose of the visualization will be to provide users with information on the number of bicycles/e-scooters used in different areas of NYC. A heatmap can be generated based on the frequency of bikes in nyc neighborhoods and overlayed with an interactive map of NYC. The goal would be to allow a user to to see a high level heatmap of bikes in NYC as well as zoom into particular areas of interest and see changes in patterns over time.
